project1.title: Local Weather App
project1.description: Used API calls to retrieve data used to code a web app designed to display and forecast weather conditions by zip code. Created, read, updated and deleted data in Firebase database and added user authentication via Firebase.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX and JSON, jQuery, Task Automation with Grunt, Bootstrap 3, Firebase
